card.description: Standard card containers, list items, content blocks

input.description: Text inputs, textareas, form controls. Focus state uses medium border.

badge.description: Status badges, pills, tags. No border, high border radius for pill shape.

modal.description: Dialogs, modals, overlays. No border, relies on shadow for separation.

avatar.description: User avatars, profile images. Full radius for perfect circle.

usage.thin: Default for cards, inputs, separators, most UI elements
usage.medium: Focus states, selected items, active borders, emphasis
usage.thick: Strong visual separation, loading indicators, progress bars
usage.sm: Minimal rounding, tight spaces, utility components
usage.md: Standard rounding for cards, buttons, inputs
usage.lg: Prominent rounding for modals, badges, featured cards
usage.full: Perfect circles/pills for avatars, badges, icon buttons

notes.consistency: Use md (8px) radius for most components to maintain visual consistency
notes.accessibility: 2px focus borders meet WCAG requirements for visible focus indicators
notes.states: Interactive elements should increase border weight on focus/active states
